services.name: Dog Grooming
services.description: Professional full-service dog grooming including bath, brush, trim, nail clipping, and ear cleaning. We handle all breeds from small puppies to large dogs with care and expertise.

services.name: Cat Grooming
services.description: Specialized cat grooming services with experienced handlers who understand feline behavior. Includes bathing, brushing, nail trimming, and mat removal for all cat breeds.

services.name: Puppy First Grooming
services.description: Gentle introduction to grooming for puppies aged 8 weeks and up. We create a positive first experience with bath, brush, nail trim, and lots of treats and patience.

services.name: De-Shedding Treatment
services.description: Professional de-shedding service to reduce excessive shedding by up to 90%. Includes specialized shampoo, conditioner, and thorough brushing to remove loose undercoat.

services.name: Flea and Tick Treatment
services.description: Complete flea and tick treatment bath with medicated shampoo to eliminate parasites and soothe irritated skin. Safe for dogs and cats of all ages.

services.name: Nail Clipping
services.description: Professional nail trimming service for dogs and cats. We carefully clip nails to the appropriate length and smooth sharp edges to prevent scratching and discomfort.

services.name: Teeth Cleaning
services.description: Pet dental hygiene service including teeth brushing with pet-safe toothpaste to reduce plaque, tartar buildup, and prevent bad breath.

services.name: Breed-Specific Grooming
services.description: Expert grooming tailored to your pet's breed standards. From poodle clips to schnauzer trims, we know the specific requirements for each breed.

services.name: Show Dog Preparation
services.description: Professional grooming for show dogs and competition preparation. Breed standard cuts, coat conditioning, and finishing touches for the show ring.

services.name: Mobile Pet Grooming
services.description: Convenient mobile grooming service that comes to your door. Full grooming salon in our van with all the equipment needed for professional grooming at your location.

services.name: Senior Pet Grooming
services.description: Gentle grooming specifically designed for senior pets with special needs. Extra care and patience for older animals with mobility issues or health concerns.

services.name: Medicated Bath
services.description: Therapeutic bathing service using veterinarian-recommended medicated shampoos for skin conditions, allergies, or dermatological issues.
